org.matrix.androidsdk.db

Class MXMediaDownloadWorkerTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.os.AsyncTask<Integer,IMXMediaDownloadListener.DownloadStats,Void>
      • org.matrix.androidsdk.db.MXMediaDownloadWorkerTask

  • class MXMediaDownloadWorkerTask
extends android.os.AsyncTask<Integer,IMXMediaDownloadListener.DownloadStats,Void>
    This class manages the media downloading in background.

    • Nested Class Summary
